title: Because of Boards I no longer know what Reds do
body:
In the previous forum whenever a Red would post it would say under their a name a title to help inform the viewer what it is that Red (supposedly) does at work. It really helped because then for a thread about balance a designer would come on and go 'This is a great idea, shame I don't work for the balance team' or on an design thread member of the balance team would post and go 'This is a great idea, shame I don't work for the design team' so it at least gave us the impression that Riot were engaging with their community in a meaningful way.

Now, however, there are no such titles. So when someone posts a thread and says 'Hey guys I have this really cool super mega idea you should implement' and Riot MountMctwattyBollocks posts saying 'Yeah great idea!' I have no clue if this person is going to actually do something because it's relevant to his team, or whether he's just posting as Joe Bloggs.

Can you change it back please to give me the perception that you are actually doing something.

Thanks,

replies.body: Mouse over their name; the same title from the old forums is there.

> Mouse over their name; the same title from the old forums is there.

Yup! If you mouse over the name, titles will pop up!
My main problem lies in the fact that I can't recognize the reds anymore. :( I miss morello's anivia avatar and Phreaks Fiddlesticks avatar.

Unfortunately this will apparently never happen according to the Boards team, so...yeah.  Maybe if literally every single player mentions their desire for this feature, but a vocal majority doesn't seem to be enough.

> 
> Yup! If you mouse over the name, titles will pop up!

Can't mouse over on a mobile reader thou :(

Alternatively, if you get the Forum Enhancer Kit you can easily see the titles of Rioters without needing to hover your mouse over them.

http://i.imgur.com/9zdJVIR.jpg

Because of boards I no longer know what anybody does.  Use to I had 1 place to go and could get a sense of what was going on in the world of LoL in just a few seconds.. now it's like seeing white noise.

What?  Every single thread that was created that held any importance was on GD before.  Hundreds and hundreds of threads everyday posted on one forum.  How could that be even close to being any easier than the way the current boards are setup where you can go to "Gameplay and Balance" to find out the new FotM champs that everyone thinks are OP.  Or go to "Announcements" to see the major announcements that Riot makes.  Or go to "Esports" to find out the latest that everyone is talking about in that category.  Makes no sense.
